publishing_focus.primary_focus: Word games such as word search, anagrams, cryptograms and word ladders
publishing_focus.target_audience: Word game enthusiasts, language educators and learners
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Specializes in unique and creative word games, emphasizing both entertainment and educational value
publishing_focus.example_titles: Anagram Masterpieces by David L. Hoyt, Cryptogram Challenges by Mark Danna
